blocks.name: 0idnsgd
blocks.content: The whole group and the zero subgroup are normal subgroups of a group. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: trivsubgd
blocks.content: The only subgroup of a trivial group is itself. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm trivsubgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, csn(c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c2)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp)))
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, csn(c3), w0)
  eqssd(c0, csn(c3), w0)
  sseqtrd(c0, csn(c3), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  subgss(c0, c2, c1)
  snssd(c3, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  subg0cl(c0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trivsubgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 = { c3 })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c2))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1), (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Grp))
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, { c3 }, w0)
  eqssd(c0, { c3 }, w0)
  sseqtrd(c0, { c3 }, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c2))
  subgss(c0, c2, c1)
  snssd(c3, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c2))
  subg0cl(c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: trivsubgd2
blocks.content: The only subgroup of a trivial group is itself. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm trivsubgd2(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csubg, c0), csn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(csubg, c0), csn(c1), w0)
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(csubg, c0), csn(c1), w0)
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  trivsubgd(cv(hs0), c1, c0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0)), wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  snssd(c1, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  subgid(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(csubg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trivsubgd2(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(SubGrp ` c0)= { c1 })
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 = { c2 })
} = {
  eqssd((SubGrp ` c0), { c1 }, w0)
  ssrdv(hs0, (SubGrp ` c0), { c1 }, w0)
  ex(w0, hs0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), hs0 ‚àà { c1 })
  sylibr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)), hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  trivsubgd(hs0, c1, c0, c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), c1 = { c2 })
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  snssd(c1, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  subgid(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((SubGrp ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c({ c1 })
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: trivnsgd
blocks.content: The only normal subgroup of a trivial group is itself. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm trivnsgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), csn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(cnsg, c0), csn(c1), w0)
  sseqtrd(cfv(cnsg, c0), csn(c1), cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cnsg, c0), cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cnsg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0))))
  nsgsubg(cv(hs0), c0)
  trivsubgd2(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  snssd(c1, cfv(cnsg, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  nsgid(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cnsg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(csubg, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trivnsgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { c1 })
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 = { c2 })
} = {
  eqssd((NrmSGrp ` c0), { c1 }, w0)
  sseqtrd((NrmSGrp ` c0), { c1 }, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  ssrdv(hs0, (NrmSGrp ` c0), (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c0)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)))
  nsgsubg(hs0, c0)
  trivsubgd2(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  snssd(c1, (NrmSGrp ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  nsgid(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((NrmSGrp ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((SubGrp ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: triv1nsgd
blocks.content: A trivial group has exactly one normal subgroup. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm triv1nsgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c1o))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c1o, csn(c1), w0)
  trivnsgd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(csn(c1), cen, c1o), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl6eqel(c1, universe, csn(c2), w0)
  snex(c2)
  ensn1g(c1, universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm triv1nsgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(NrmSGrp ` c0)[‚âÖ]1o)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 = { c2 })
} = {
  eqbrtrd((NrmSGrp ` c0), cen, c1o, { c1 }, w0)
  trivnsgd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, { c1 }[‚âÖ]1o, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqel(c1, universe, { c2 }, w0)
  snex(c2)
  ensn1g(c1, universe)
}

blocks.name: 1nsgtrivd
blocks.content: A group with exactly one normal subgroup is trivial. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1nsgtrivd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c2), cen, c1o))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c0, csn(csn(c1))))
  eleqtrd(c0, csn(csn(c1)), cfv(cnsg, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  nsgid(c2, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c2), csn(csn(c1))), wcel(csn(c1), cfv(cnsg, c2)), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c2), cen, c1o))
  syl(w0, wcel(csn(c1), cfv(cnsg, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  0nsg(c2, c1)
  en1eqsn(csn(c1), cfv(cnsg, c2))
  mp1i(w0, wb(wcel(c0, csn(csn(c1))), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csn(c1), universe))
  snex(c1)
  elsn2g(csn(c1), universe, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 1nsgtrivd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = { c1 })
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(NrmSGrp ` c2)[‚âÖ]1o)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0 = { c1 }, c0 ‚àà { { c1 } })
  eleqtrd(c0, { { c1 } }, (NrmSGrp ` c2), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c2), c2 ‚àà Grp)
  nsgid(c2, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c2)= { { c1 } }, { c1 } ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c2), (NrmSGrp ` c2)[‚âÖ]1o)
  syl(w0, { c1 } ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c2), c2 ‚àà Grp)
  0nsg(c2, c1)
  en1eqsn({ c1 }, (NrmSGrp ` c2))
  mp1i(w0, (c0 ‚àà { { c1 } } ‚Üî c0 = { c1 }), { c1 } ‚àà ùïå)
  snex(c1)
  elsn2g({ c1 }, universe, c0)
}

blocks.name: cycsubggenodd
blocks.content: Relationship between the order of a subgroup and the order of a generator of the subgroup. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm cycsubggenodd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmg, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cod, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), cif(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, wcel(c2, cfn)), cif(cfv(chash, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1)))), nat0, wcel(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1))), cfn)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cif(cfv(chash, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1)))), nat0, wcel(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1))), cfn))), wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3))
  dfod2(s0, c4, c1, c3, c0, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1)), c5)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1)))
  ifbieq1d(cfv(chash, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1)))), nat0, cfv(chash, c2), w0, wcel(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1))), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn))
  eleq1d(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1))), cfn, c2, w0)
  fveq2d(chash, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c2, w0)
  eqcomd(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cycsubggenodd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(.g ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(od ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 = ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0 ` c1), if(c2 ‚àà Fin,(# ` c2), 0), if(ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)))‚àà Fin,(# ` ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)))), 0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)= if(ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)))‚àà Fin,(# ` ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)))), 0), c4 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c3)
  dfod2(s0, c4, c1, c3, c0, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)), c5)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)))
  ifbieq1d((# ` ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)))), nat0, (# ` c2), w0, ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1)))‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà Fin)
  eleq1d(ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1))), cfn, c2, w0)
  fveq2d(chash, ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1))), c2, w0)
  eqcomd(ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]c1))), c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: hashfinmndnn
blocks.content: A finite monoid has positive integer size. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm hashfinmndnn(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  hashcl(c0)
  neqned(cfv(chash, c0), nat0, w0)
  hashelne0d(c0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfn, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c0), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  mndidcl(c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  elnnne0(cfv(chash, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hashfinmndnn(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(# ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Fin)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (# ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (# ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï0, (# ` c0)‚â† 0)
  syl(w0, (# ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  hashcl(c0)
  neqned((# ` c0), nat0, w0)
  hashelne0d(c0, (0 ` c1), cfn, w0)
  syl(w0, (0 ` c1)‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà Mnd)
  mndidcl(c1, (0 ` c1), c0)
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  elnnne0((# ` c0))
}

blocks.name: hashfingrpnn
blocks.content: A finite group has positive integer size. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
